subject: False Arrests, Convictions and Imprisonments
Football
lead_paragraph: After serving almost six years behind bars for a crime he didn’t commit, Brian Banks is trying to make it in the N.F.L. with the Atlanta Falcons.
snippet: After serving almost six years behind bars for a crime he didn’t commit, Brian Banks is trying to make it in the N.F.L. with the Atlanta Falcons.
